name: The Pirate Quest
short_description:
Get ready for an adventure of a lifetime. With a map in hand, you set forth towards the unpredictable sea to find Captain Jack's Sparrow Treasures. However, your journey demands not only your pirate skills but also your wit, your strategy and also a bit of your luck. So get ready mates! Anchors Away!

The Pirate Quest is a simple edutainment program that is similar to a role a dice game. Players are asked to role a dice to move through the map. However, they must first answer questions correctly to make any progress. Questions include Mathematics, History, General Science, Movies and Comics and much much more.

The Pirate Quest includes two game modes:
1.) Story Mode
2.) Expedition
 
and two mini games:
1.) 3-in-a-Row
2.) Finders Keepers

Requires:
Adobe Flash Player/Plugin
DotNET 4
32bit machines

Tested on:
Windows 7 
Windows Vista
Windows XP (with a few UI problems)
